edu.internet2.middleware.grouperKimConnector.node

Class XPathSplitNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.internet2.middleware.grouperKimConnector.node.XPathSplitNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.kuali.rice.kew.engine.node.Node, org.kuali.rice.kew.engine.node.SplitNode

    public class XPathSplitNode
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.kuali.rice.kew.engine.node.SplitNode
    This is a generic split node that takes an xpath expression and selects the branch that matches the text in the document content for that xpath expression. 
           <split name="routeOnBehalfSplit">
        <activationType>P</activationType>
        <mandatoryRoute>false</mandatoryRoute>
        <finalApproval>false</finalApproval>
        
        <!-- can be true or false, if true, then will select first matching branch, default to false -->
        <pickOneResult>true</pickOneResult>
        <expression>
          <expressionXpath>/documentContent/applicationContent/data/version[@current = "true"]/field[@name = "privilegeChange"]/value</expressionXpath>
          
          <!-- defaults to 'true' -->
          <expressionValue>delete</expressionValue>
          <branchName>leftBranch</branchName>
        </expression>
        <expression>
          <expressionXpath>/documentContent/applicationContent/data/version[@current = "true"]/field[@name = "privilegeChange"]/value</expressionXpath>
          <expressionValue>add</expressionValue>
          <branchName>addBranch</branchName>
        </expression>
        <expressionElse>
          <branchName>rightBranch</branchName>          
        </expressionElse>
        <type>edu.internet2.middleware.grouperKimConnector.node.XPathSplitNode</type>
      </split>
